ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Quest] EQ bugs
ygData.msgSnippet: Target a mob that is red to you and start to try and kill it.  When you are at about 1/3 health type /ex (stands for experience) and the computer will kill the
ygData.messageBody:
Target a mob that is red to you and start to try and kill it. When you are
at about 1/3 health type /ex (stands for experience) and the computer will
kill the mob for you, just make sure your at 1/3 or less life and also that
the mob is a deep red. Its really fast exp.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: MattManE_99@... [mailto:MattManE_99@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2001 6:53 PM
To: EQ-Quest@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ-Quest] EQ bugs


Can anyone tell me if they know of any bugs in EQ? I need exp to gain
a couple of levels to get new spells. Thanks, I appreciate it.
